mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM trip WHERE status = 'APPROVED'
SELECT count(*) FROM trip WHERE trip_category = #{category} AND status = 'APPROVED'
SELECT option_ids FROM trip WHERE trip_no = #{num}
SELECT count(*) FROM trip WHERE trip_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') AND status = 'APPROVED'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trip (trip_name, trip_price, trip_stock,trip_max_stock,trip_date, reg_date, expire_date, trip_main_img, trip_category, option_ids, file_id) VALUES (#{tripName}, #{tripPrice},#{tripStock}, #{tripMaxStock},#{tripDate}, #{regDate}, #{expireDate}, #{tripMainIMG}, #{tripCategory}, #{optionIds}, #{fileId})
INSERT INTO tripfile (file_id, main_img, intro_img, route_img, schedule_img, detail_img) VALUES (#{fileId}, #{mainIMG}, #{introIMG}, #{routeIMG}, #{scheduleIMG}, #{detailIMG})
